div.p: PICTURES AND TRACK CHAIRS. WE'LL EXPLAIN IT TOMORROW.
>>> FINALLY TONIGHT, "FACTOR" TIP OF THE DAY.
I WAS RUNNING AROUND THE WEST COAST OF IRELAND AND OFF TO
GALWAY. THE REASON I LIKE THAT PART OF
IRELAND, THINGS HAVEN'T CHANGED MUCH OVER THE CENTURIES.
SAME LANDSCAPE, SAME WELCOMING HOSPITALITY, WE HAD A GREAT TIME
THERE, LOTS OF "FACTOR" FANS IN IRELAND.
THERE I AM. ALL RIGHT.
AND OUR GUIDES, THE BEST. BEST IN THE WORLD I THINK.
EVEN THE IRISH FOOD WAS GOOD. I DID NOT DESTROY THAT CASTLE,
BY THE WAY. IT WAS THAT WAY WHEN I GOT
THERE. THE IRISH HAVE THE BIG
BREAKFASTS OVER THERE. HAVE TO DO A LOT OF WALKING AND
RUNNING THROUGHOUT THE REST OF THE DAY.
A GREAT TIME. AND THERE AREN'T -- THERE ISN'T
MORE WELCOMING PEOPLE IN THE WORLD THAN THE IRISH.
SO HERE IS A TIP, NO MATTER WHERE YOUR ANCESTORS ARE FROM,
TRY TO VISIT THAT PLACE. IT'S IMPORTANT FOR ALL OF US TO
KNOW HOW WE GOT HERE, HOW OUR FAMILIES WERE SHAPED.
ALL MY PEOPLE CAME FROM IRELAND AND I'M A MUCH BETTER PERSON
BECAUSE I KNOW WHAT HAPPENED TO THEM.
MY NEW FAVORITE COLUMNIST WILL GO IN DEPTH.
CHECK IT THURSDAY ON BILLOREILLY.COM.
FACTOR "TIP OF THE DAY." THAT IS IT FOR US.
CHECK OUT THE FACTOR WEBSITE AND DIFFERENT FROM BILLOREILLY.COM.
